member.name: T:Syncfusion.SfSkinManager.SfSkinManager
member.summary: Represents the class that manages themes for Syncfusion controls.
member.remarks: Skin manager applies theme to all the controls in application in optimistic way. It iterates through controls in visual tree and add the corresponding theme resource dictionary to apply theme. For example, if you are applying MaterialLight theme, skin manager will load resources from "Syncfusion.Themes.MaterialLight.WPF.dll". Ensure you have added theme assembly as reference. It is recommended to apply theme before InitializeComponent for better performance.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.SfSkinManager.SfSkinManager.RegisterTheme(System.String,Syncfusion.SfSkinManager.SkinHelper)
member.summary: Method to register theme name and its .
member.param: Instance of skin helper in theme assembly.
member.returns: true, if the theme registered successfully. false, if theme name already registered.
member.remarks: The returns theme resource dictionary details to skin manager to apply theme. Supported themes and its settings

member.name: M:Syncfusion.SfSkinManager.SfSkinManager.RegisterThemeSettings(System.String,Syncfusion.SfSkinManager.IThemeSetting)
member.summary: Helper method to register theme name, and its custom information.
member.param: Instance of ThemeSettings in theme assembly
member.returns: true, if the theme registered successfully. false, if theme name already registered.
member.remarks: The returns theme resource dictionary details to skin manager to apply theme. Supported themes and its settings

member.name: M:Syncfusion.SfSkinManager.SfSkinManager.GetTheme(System.Windows.DependencyObject)
member.summary: Gets the of particular control where will utilize to apply respective themes for control and its child element in application.
member.param: The element whose must be retrieved.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.SfSkinManager.SfSkinManager.SetTheme(System.Windows.DependencyObject,Syncfusion.SfSkinManager.Theme)
member.summary: Sets the value to particular control where will utilize to apply respective themes for control and its child element in application.
member.value: The The theme info. The default value is instance of with property value as Default.
member.param: The element to which the must be set.

remarks.para: We can provide theme name in this format: MaterialDark and we can also provide custom theme name in this format: CustomTheme1;BaseThemeName where CustomTheme1 denotes the custom theme name and BaseThemeName denotes the theme name from which it is derived. For example CustomTheme1;MaterialDark.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SfSkinManager.SfSkinManager.ThemeProperty
member.summary: Identifies the dependency attached property to get or set a theme name where will utilize to apply themes for control and its child element in application.
member.remarks: The identifier for the dependency attached property.
